thread.title: On Transportation: What matters when you fly?
thread.title_full: On Transportation: What matters when you fly?

author: Austin Alonzo
title: On Transportation: What matters when you fly?
text:
Already a subscriber? Sign In Here With the redevelopment of Kansas City International Airport gaining speed again, we thought it might be a good time so survey readers about what matters to them when they fly. Topping the list of favorites: distance from curb to gate. Least favorite: food/retail offerings. Although we realize our survey isn’t scientifically valid, it nevertheless offers an interesting snapshot as KCI enters a period of inevitable — and probably drastic — change. Check out the accompanying infographic to see where our readers’ priorities are when it comes to air travel.
